channel.title: The LaSalle String Quartet II
channel.description:
This series presents performances by the La Salle Quartet of Cincinnati, Ohio.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Mozart, G.M. Koenig, and Dvorak, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, features performances of Mozart: Quartet in D minor; G.M. Koenig: Quartet #1; Dvorak: "American" Quartet.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century

item.title: Mozart, G.M. Koenig, and Dvorak, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, features performances of Mozart: Quartet in D minor; G.M. Koenig: Quartet #1; Dvorak: "American" Quartet.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century

item.title: Matyas Seiber and Beethoven, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of three parts, features performances of Matyas Seiber: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 132, No. 5.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century

item.title: Vivaldi, Webern, and Beethoven, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of three parts, features performances of Vivaldi: Sonata a Quattro; Webern: Five Movements, Op. 5; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 59, No. 1.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century

item.title: Haydn, Franco Evangelist, and Brahms, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of three parts, features performances of Haydn: Quartet, Op. 75, No. 1; Franco Evangelist: Aleatorio in Two Versions; Brahms: Quartet in A minor.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century

item.title: Bartok, Beethoven, and Stravinsky, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, features performances of Bartok: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 18, No. 3; Stravinsky: Concertino
item.dc:creator: Burns, Bill
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century

item.title: Schoenberg and Schumann, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of three parts, features performances of Schoenberg: Quartet No. 3; Schumann: Quintet for Piano and String Quartet.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: String quartets--20th century
